title: Recitations
content:
Recitation notes are courtesy of Eung Jun Brandon Lee, and are used with permission. Notes for recitations 6-8 are not available.
REC # TOPICS RECITATION NOTES 1 Fundamental theorem of asset pricing (PDF) 2 Black-Scholes formula (PDF) 3 Stochastic calculus (PDF) 4 Stochastic calculus (cont.) (PDF) 5 Applications of risk-neutral pricing (PDF) 9 Introduction to econometrics (PDF) 10 Ordinary least squares: Estimation and standard errors (PDF) 11 Nonlinear least squares: Applications to MIDAS and probit models (PDF)
